mods.note: Library has: Alberta and British Columbia, General Drafting, 1949. Esso road maps: 1956; 1957; 1958; 1959; 1961; 1964; 1965; 1966; 1967; 1968; 1969; 1970 (2 c.); 1971; 1973; 1974; 1978.

Companies other than Esso: 1965 (Alberta & British Columbia. Rolph, Clark Stone for Texaco) -- 1966 ([Western Canada] for Texaco (by H.M. Gousha) 2 sheets (east and west). West sheet: Alberta & British Columbia. East sheet: unable to locate as of Nov./00) -- 1968 (Western Canada, for Chevron (by H.M. Gousha) -- 1968 (Alaska Western Canada, i.e. Alberta, Alaska & B.C. for American (by Rand-McNally) -- 1969 (Alaska Western Canada, i.e. Alberta, Alaska & B.C. for Husky (by Rand-McNally) -- 1969 Alberta-British Columbia for Shell (by H.M. Gousha) -- 1970, 1972, 1973 (Alberta & British Columbia for Texaco (by Rolph-McNally)-- 1971 (Alberta, British Columbia, Alaska by Diversified Map corp. for American Oil) -- 1972 (Saskatchewan, Manitoba, Northwestern Ont., by Rolph McNally for Texaco) -- 1972 (Alberta-British Columbia, by Creative Sales for Shell) -- 1972 (2 c.) (British Columbia-Alberta by Rolph McNally for Gulf) -- 1973 (Alberta, British Columbia, Alaska, 1974, for American Amoco Oil, by Diversified Map Corp.) -- 1973 Alberta-British Columbia, for Texaco (Rolph-McNally). Inset are city maps) -- 1974 (British Columbia-Alberta, by Rolph McNally, for Gulf).
